publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6910 Cathy Jamieson: Land O’ Burns Brass Band Competition—That the Parliament commends the Dalmellington Band on the continued success of its annual Land O’ Burns Brass Band competition; welcomes the competition’s continued support from South Ayrshire Council, and congratulates Newmilns and Galston Band on winning the Co-op Trophy for the highest placed Ayrshire band.
S3M-6910 Land O’ Burns Brass Band Competition (lodged on 3 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6910 Land O’ Burns Brass Band Competition (lodged on 3 September 2010) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-6910 Land O’ Burns Brass Band Competition (lodged on 3 September 2010) Aileen Campbell*, Ken Macintosh*, John Scott*, Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*
